channel.title: Starting text
channel.description:
ok i cannot find client.java!
im using mopar 3.2
317 client.
xp ____________________________________________________________________________________ i wanna change the startup text from that hybridscape stuff to
welcome to my server! remember This server is pickup and advertise and get Armdyl!

item.title: Starting text
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“Kuchiki, post:4, topic:302858”][quote author=codex2009 link=topic=399140.msg2961228#msg2961228 date=1253222149]
This is server help not client help!!!
[/quote]

This is a server question not a client question!!!

The thing your looking for isn’t in the client files. Look in the server files.[/quote]

Wait a minute… Are you dumb? This is SERVER sided, not client. I can’t believe it. How is the log in message client sided?

Also… he doesn’t mean client files… he means CLIENT.JAVA

And, if I’m wrong… sorry? lol. You just both seemed like such idiots with the posts and it was confusing me.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting text
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“ytpingas, post:1, topic:302858”]ok i cannot find client.java!

im using mopar 3.2

317 client.

xp

i wanna change the startup text from that hybridscape stuff to

welcome to my server!
remember This server is pickup
and advertise and get Armdyl![/quote]

Something i have had to do when i don’t know the file it’s in is go into every single one and hit (CTRL+F) and search the thing i want to change… in your case, search “Hybridscape” or “Hybrid Scape” and if it says it cannot find it, wrong folder/file! Go to the next! Or… get a Z-File Searcher and search with that “hybridscape” or “Hybrid Scape” and whichever one looks right, go to that folder and change it.

Read full topic
